content: eyeball with nerve endings designed by regina rioux gonzalez materials dmc size 8 perle cotton thread 1 ball each color 1 white 0001 black 0310 variegated garnet 0115 for iris any variegated colorway in dmc size 8 perle cotton thread 1 ball or artfabrik size 8 thread http //www artfabrik com/index html 1 hank us 6 steel hook embroidery needle fiberfill abbreviations chain chain st stitch round round sts - stitches single_crochet single_crochet decrease together slip_stitch slip_stitch gauge 12 sts x 12 row = 1 directions * pattern is worked in the round each round begins with chain 1 and ends with slip_stitch in first single_crochet of round to join first st in round is worked in same st as slp st to join previous round round 1 - foundation black chain 2 8 single_crochet in first chain slip_stitch to join round break off black round 2 iris color attach iris color chain 1 2sc in every st in round slip_stitch 16 sts total round 3 chain 1 single_crochet next st 2 single_crochet in next st repeat to end of round slip_stitch break off iris color round 4 white attach white chain 1 1 single_crochet in every st in round slip_stitch 24 sts total round 5 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat to end of round slip_stitch round 6 chain 1 1 single_crochet in every st in round slip_stitch 32 sts total round 7 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat to end of round slip_stitch round 8 chain 1 1 single_crochet in every st in round slip_stitch 40 sts total round 9 chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 sts 2sc in next st repeat to end of round slip_stitch round 10 chain 1 1 single_crochet in every st in round slip_stitch 48 sts total round 11 through round 15 repeat round 10 round 16 chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 sts single_crochet next 2 sts decrease repeat to end of round slip_stitch round 17 chain 1 1 single_crochet in every st in round slip_stitch 40 sts total round 18 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3 sts single_crochet next 2 sts decrease repeat to end of round slip_stitch round 19 chain 1 1 single_crochet in every st in round slip_stitch 32 sts total round 20 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet next 2 sts decrease repeat to end of round slip_stitch round 21 - chain 1 1 single_crochet in every st in round slip_stitch 24 sts total * before beginning next round stuff with fiberfill round 22 chain 1 single_crochet in next st single_crochet next 2 sts decrease repeat to end of round slip_stitch round 23 chain 1 single_crochet 2 sts decrease repeat to end of round slip_stitch break off white round 24 variegated garnet attach garnet chain 1 1 single_crochet in every st in round slip_stitch 8 sts total * begin nerve endings 1 enough thread to make more than one eyeball round 25
